caption: Who then is invincible? The one who cannot be upset by anything outside their reasoned choice.
It is unrealistic to expect people to see you as you see yourself.
If your choices are beautiful, so too will you be.
The essence of philosophy is that a man should so live that his happiness shall depend as little as possible on external things.
If you are ever tempted to look for outside approval, realize that you have compromised your integrity. If you need a witness, be your own.
Nothing important comes into being overnight; even grapes or figs need time to ripen.
We control our opinion, choice, desire, aversion, and, in a word, everything of our own doing.
It is essential that we not respond impulsively... take a moment before reacting, and you will find it is easier to maintain control.
A ship should not ride on a single anchor, nor life on a single hope.
First learn the meaning of what you say, and then speak discourses.
It is the part of a wise man to resist pleasures, but of a foolish man to be a slave to them.
Who then is invincible? The one who cannot be upset by anything outside their reasoned choice.
Frightened of change? But what can exist without it?
Other people's mistakes? Leave them to their makers.
Let each thing you would do, say, or intend be like that of a dying person.
The impediment to action advances action. What stands in the way becomes the way.
You have power over your mind, not outside events
Stop allowing your mind to be a slave, to be jerked about.
Never let the future disturb you. You will meet it, if you have to, with the same weapons of reason which today arm you against the present.
Never let the future disturb you. You will meet it, if you have to, with the same weapons of reason which today arm you against the present.
I begin to speak only when I'm certain what I'll say isn't better left unsaid.
I begin to speak only when I'm certain what I'll say isn't better left unsaid.
Joy comes to us from those whom we love even when they are absent.
You can tell the character of every man when you see how he gives and receives praise.
Everything hangs on one's thinking.... A man is as unhappy as he has convinced himself he is.
Most powerful is he who has himself in his own power.
If my wealth goes away, it takes with it nothing but itself.
Nothing delights the mind as much as loving and loyal friendship.
Just as rich fields must not be forced... so constant work on the anvil will fracture the force of the mind.
Man conquers the world by conquering himself.
If I followed the multitude, I should not have studied philosophy.
The willing are led by fate, the reluctant are dragged
We see the flaws of others quite clearly, in other words, but we have a blind spot for our own.
We do not learn from experience, we learn from reflecting on experience.
Anger is not impressive or tough, it's a mistake. It's weakness.
